column1: :''The main article for this subject is located at '''[[Túrin
In [[Nargothrond]] [[Túrin]] hid his name, calling himself '''''Agarwaen, son of [[Úmarth]]''''' ("Bloodstained, son of Ill-fate").<ref>{{S
column3: 10}}, p. 159</ref>  [[Finduilas]] did not believe that Agarwaen was his name nor that it fit him, so she called him [[Thurin]], the Secret.<ref>{{CH
